page.discussion: The .NEXT() method moves to the next file in the list of files referenced by the object pointer. The method returns .T. (TRUE) if there is another entry in the list; otherwise, it returns .F. (FALSE).
page.example: dim ptr as P ptr = filefind.first("c:\*.txt") ? ptr.name() = "c:\Button.Txt" ? ptr.next() = .T. ? ptr.name() = "c:\Check box.Txt"
